templates.question: How is STORE/LOCATION ranked amongst all stores
templates.desc: Store Ranking by revenue or sales or REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY
templates.query: WITH RANKS AS (SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY) DESC ) AS LOCATION_RANK FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL ) SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK FROM DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD JOIN RANKS R ON R.LOCATION_LABEL = L.LOCATION_LABEL GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK
